extendedInfo.description: This application serves the users to effectively manage their projects in various locations. The application mainly has four major modules 1.Projects2.Clients3.Contacts4.Invoice (Report)Projects  : This module gives an overall information on the projects and their improvement status viz., Active , Inactive, Prelim and Archived.2.Client : This  lists all the clients.3.Contacts : This lists  all the contact information's.4.Invoice : This provides the user to generate invoice for each job in the project.

reviews.comment: It doesn\'t open and is not clear
reviews.author: A Google User
